name: Healer-Vs-Society
description:
3D game where you fighting against time, trying to heal every single one of your society.

You control all the population with the Axis controls and try to heal them and don't let them infect each other.

Your society is just Spheres running around. They don't eat or drink, yet they are a great society worthy of your help.

every individual has an immunity period of time so that he doesn't get infect right after you heal him.

Time increases every level with the population increase, and hence the difficulty increases.

However, immunity time decreases with more levels.

Assets used:

Potta-One Font  Google Fonts

10 SkyBoxes Pack: Day-night  Unity Asset Store

City Kit (Roads) Kenney.nl
claping sound SoundBible.com
FL Studio Free Trial

Oxmond "X" logo bitmap YouTube
